mapper.sql: select u.salt,u.password,u.user_type,u.version,u.org_id,u.user_id, u.psn_id, u.user_code, u.nick_name, u.email, u.avatar, u.phonenumber, u.sex, u.status, u.dr, u.login_ip, u.login_date, u.create_by, u.create_time, u.remark, d.dept_id, d.parent_id, d.dept_name, d.order_num, d.leader, d.status as dept_status, r.role_id, r.role_name, r.role_key, r.role_sort, r.data_scope, r.status as role_status, o.org_name,u.wechatopenid from sys_user u left join sys_psndoc psn on psn.psn_id=u.psn_id left join sys_dept d on psn.dept_id = d.dept_id left join sys_user_role ur on u.user_id = ur.user_id left join sys_role r on r.role_id = ur.role_id left join sys_org o on o.org_id = u.org_id

select u.user_type,u.version,u.org_id,u.user_id, u.psn_id, u.user_code, u.nick_name, u.email, u.avatar, u.phonenumber, u.sex, u.status, u.dr, u.login_ip, u.login_date, u.create_by, u.create_time, u.remark, o.org_name,u.wechatopenid from sys_user u left join sys_org o on o.org_id = u.org_id

where u.dr = 0
AND u.user_id in ( select ur.user_id from sys_user_role ur join sys_role r on ur.role_id=r.role_id where r.role_name like concat('%', #{roleName}, '%'))
AND u.user_code like concat('%', #{userCode}, '%')
AND u.nick_Name like concat('%', #{nickName}, '%')
AND (u.nick_Name like concat('%', #{searchValue}, '%') or u.user_code like concat('%', #{searchValue}, '%') )
AND u.status = #{status}
AND u.user_type = #{userType}
AND u.phonenumber like concat('%', #{phonenumber}, '%')
AND date_format(u.create_time,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{beginTime},'%y%m%d')
AND date_format(u.create_time,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{endTime},'%y%m%d')
AND (u.org_id = #{orgId} or exists( SELECT 1 FROM sys_org t where u.org_id = t.org_id and find_in_set(t.org_id,queryOrgChildList(#{orgId}))))
